a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Projections of plastic waste by disposal method, World
Mismanaged plastic waste is plastic that is either littered or inadequately disposed. A country's total does not
include waste that is exported overseas, where it may be mismanaged. Based on the "business-as-usual"
scenario which assumes that current policies remain unchanged in the foreseeable future.
Note: Regional aggregates were calculated by Our World in Data and are based on those specified by the OECD.
